metadata.title: CVE-2017-6594 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The transit path validation code in Heimdal before 7.3 might allow attackers to bypass the capath policy protection mechanism by leveraging failure to add the previous hop realm to the transit path of issued tickets.

notes.note: ratliff> Upstream: "[the fix] may break sites that rely on the bug." mdeslaur> heimdal-kdc package is in universe

criterions.comment: heimdal package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.4.0.dfsg.1-2').
